title: Kenan Thompson
description:
Kevin is joined by Saturday Night Live’s Kenan Thompson.  Kenan and Kevin talk about Kenan’s many years at Saturday Night Live, seeing Dave Chappelle perform at Madison Square Garden, how he made it out of Nickelodeon, and the highlights of his 30 year career. 

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Kenan Thompson)
